name: Barrel Highway
description:
Game made for a TriJam! 
Everything done in under 3 hours.  I tough it would be hard... But it's even harder than it sounds!
The barrel sound is a free sample from Freesound.com
Everything else was drawn/programmed by me using Godot engine during the 3 hours period!
When thinking about unconventional transportation the first thing that came to mind was the barrels from Donkey Kong, so I HAD to make a game about it!

Sadly I ran out of time while making the UI and I really didn't want to go past the 3 hours limit. So everything UI related is just placeholders, at least it works and you can see your points!

Hope someone have fun with this!
